name: Methylene Blue (Low-Dose)
description: Synthetic dye and pharmaceutical with remarkable mitochondrial-enhancing properties at low doses. Acts as an alternative electron carrier in the mitochondrial electron transport chain, bypassing Complex I/III dysfunction. Cognitive enhancer and neuroprotectant with over a century of medical use.

dosage.notes: USP pharmaceutical grade essential (NOT industrial dye). Low doses enhance mitochondria, high doses inhibit them (hormetic U-curve). Will turn urine blue-green. Very affordable.

keyFindings: Enhanced memory and cognitive function in animal and small human studies
Improved mitochondrial function in aged neurons
FDA-approved (high dose) for methemoglobinemia — century of safety data at clinical doses
interactions: SSRIs and serotonergic drugs (SEROTONIN SYNDROME RISK — serious)
